title.narrative: Apoyo Gestión Recursos Humanos en Sector Público
Support Human Resource Management in Public Sector

description.narrative: El programa consistira en dos componente: (i) Estructura Orgnizacional y (ii) Gestión de Recursos Humanos.
The program will consist of two components: (i) Organizational Structure and, (ii) Human Resource Management.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERE DE L'ECONOMIE ET DES FINANCES

activity-description.narrative: A diagnostic of the Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources (MARNDR) has been completed
A diagnostic of the Ministry of Education (MENFP) has been completed
A diagnostic of the Ministry of Justice has been completed
A diagnostic of the Ministry of Public Health (MSPP) has been completed
A diagnostic of the Ministry of Public Works (MTPTC) has been completed
A plan to restructure the Human Resources services in the Ministry of Agriculture (MARNDR) is completed
A plan to restructure the Human Resources services in the Ministry of Commerce and Industry (MCI) is developed
A plan to restructure the Human Resources services in the Ministry of Education (MENFP) is developed
Dans le but d'améliorer la production et l'efficacité du secteur Public en Matiere de présentation de services, des formations ont été réalisées au KARIBE Hotel.
De nouveaux equipements ont ete attribues au ministere de l'education nationale et de la formation professionnelle (MENFP).
De nouveaux equipements ont ete livres au ministere de la sante publique et de la population (MSPP).
De nouvelles motocyclettes ont ete donnees au ministere des travaux publics transports et communications (MTPTC) .
Des agents de la fonction publique ont pris part a des séminaires de formation sur la Gestion et l'Evaluation du Patrimoine de l'Etat, organisées par lOMRH a l'Hotel Montana.
Dotation du ministere de l'education nationale et de la formation professionnelle (MENFP) en materiels informatique.
Dotation du ministere du commerce et de l'industrie (MCI) en materiels informatiques.
L'Office de Management et des Ressources Humaines est équipé
Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources (MARNDR) equipped and connected to Human Resources database
Ministry of Education equipped and connected to Human Resources database
Ministry of Justice equipped and connected to personnel database
Ministry of Public Health and Population equipped and connected to Human Resources database
Ministry of Public Works, Transport and Communication equipped and connected to personnel database
Photo du nouveau local de l'OMRH.
Plan for the restructuring of the HR services in the Ministry of Health (MSPP) developed
Plan for the restructuring of the HR services in the Ministry of Youth and Sports (MJSP) developed
Renforcement du ministere de la justice et de la securite public (MJSP) en materiels informatiques.
Renforcement du ministere de la planification et de la cooperation externe (MPCE) en materiels informatiques.
Renforcement du ministere de la sante publique et de la population (MSPP) en terme de materiels bureautiques.
Staff members of the Human Resources area of the Ministry of Agriculture (MARNDR) have been trained
Staff members of the Human Resources area of the Ministry of Education MENFP have been trained
Staff members of the Human Resources area of the Ministry of Health (MSPP) have been trained
